trans-unit.source: To install MPIO on the host
trans-unit.target: To install MPIO on the host

trans-unit.source: Open Server Manager on your Windows Server host.
trans-unit.target: Open Server Manager on your Windows Server host.

trans-unit.source: By default, Server Manager starts when a member of the Administrators group logs on to a computer that is running Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2012.
trans-unit.target: By default, Server Manager starts when a member of the Administrators group logs on to a computer that is running Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2012.

trans-unit.source: If the Server Manager is not already open, click **Start > Server Manager**.
trans-unit.target: If the Server Manager is not already open, click **Start > Server Manager**.

trans-unit.source: Server Manager
trans-unit.target: Server Manager

trans-unit.source: Click **Server Manager > Dashboard > Add roles and features**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Server Manager > Dashboard > Add roles and features**.

trans-unit.source: This starts the **Add Roles and Features** wizard.
trans-unit.target: This starts the **Add Roles and Features** wizard.

trans-unit.source: Add Roles And Features Wizard 1
trans-unit.target: Add Roles And Features Wizard 1

trans-unit.source: In the **Add Roles and Features** wizard, do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the **Add Roles and Features** wizard, do the following:

trans-unit.source: On the **Before you begin** page, click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Before you begin** page, click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Select installation type** page, accept the default setting of **Role-based or feature-based** installation.
trans-unit.target: On the **Select installation type** page, accept the default setting of **Role-based or feature-based** installation.

trans-unit.source: Click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Add Roles And Features Wizard 2
trans-unit.target: Add Roles And Features Wizard 2

trans-unit.source: On the **Select destination server** page, choose **Select a server from the server pool**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Select destination server** page, choose **Select a server from the server pool**.

trans-unit.source: Your host server should be discovered automatically.
trans-unit.target: Your host server should be discovered automatically.

trans-unit.source: Click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Select server roles** page, click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Select server roles** page, click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Select features** page, select **Multipath I/O**, and click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Select features** page, select **Multipath I/O**, and click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Add Roles And Features Wizard 5
trans-unit.target: Add Roles And Features Wizard 5

trans-unit.source: On the **Confirm installation selections** page, confirm the selection and then select **Restart the destination server automatically if required**, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: On the **Confirm installation selections** page, confirm the selection and then select **Restart the destination server automatically if required**, as shown below.

trans-unit.source: Click **Install**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Install**.

trans-unit.source: Add Roles And Features Wizard 8
trans-unit.target: Add Roles And Features Wizard 8

trans-unit.source: You will be notified when the installation is complete.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified when the installation is complete.

trans-unit.source: Click **Close** to close the wizard.
trans-unit.target: Click **Close** to close the wizard.

trans-unit.source: Add Roles And Features Wizard 9
trans-unit.target: Add Roles And Features Wizard 9
